verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> toward<WH413> Jerusalem,<WH3389> and speak<WH5197> against<WH413> the sanctuaries,<WH4720> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH413> the land<WH127> of Israel;<WH3478>

and say<WH559> to the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH413> you; and I shall draw<WH3318> My sword<WH2719> out of its sheath<WH8593> and cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from you the righteous<WH6662> and the wicked.<WH7563>

"Because<WH3282> I shall cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from you the righteous<WH6662> and the wicked,<WH7563> therefore<WH3651> My sword<WH2719> shall go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> from its sheath<WH8593> against<WH413> all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> from south<WH5045> [to] north.<WH6828>
"Thus all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> will know<WH3045> that I, the Lord,<WH3068> have drawn<WH3318> My sword<WH2719> out of its sheath.<WH8593> It will not return<WH7725> [to its sheath] again.<WH5750>"'
"As for you, son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> groan<WH584> with breaking<WH7670> heart<WH4975> and bitter<WH4814> grief,<WH4814> groan<WH584> in their sight.<WH5869>

"And it will come<WH1961> about when<WH3588> they say<WH559> to you, 'Why<WH5921> <WH4100> do you groan<WH584>?' that you will say,<WH559> 'Because<WH413> of the news<WH8052> that is coming;<WH935> and every<WH3605> heart<WH3820> will melt,<WH4549> all<WH3605> hands<WH3027> will be feeble,<WH7503> every<WH3605> spirit<WH7307> will faint,<WH3543> and all<WH3605> knees<WH1290> will be weak<WH1980> as water.<WH4325> Behold,<WH2009> it comes<WH935> and it will happen,<WH1961>' declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>"
Again the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy<WH5012> and say,<WH559> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord.<WH3068> 'Say,<WH559> 'A sword,<WH2719> a sword<WH2719> sharpened<WH2300> And also<WH1571> polished!<WH4803>

'Sharpened<WH2300> to make<WH2873> a slaughter,<WH2874> Polished<WH4803> to flash<WH1300> like lightning!<WH1300>' Or<WH176> shall we rejoice,<WH7797> the rod<WH7626> of My son<WH1121> despising<WH3988> every<WH3605> tree<WH6086>?

"And it is given<WH5414> to be polished,<WH4803> that it may be handled;<WH8610> the sword<WH2719> is sharpened<WH2300> and polished,<WH4803> to give<WH5414> it into the hand<WH3027> of the slayer.<WH2026>

"Cry<WH2199> out and wail,<WH3213> son<WH1121> of man;<WH120> for it is against My people,<WH5971> it is against all<WH3605> the officials<WH5387> of Israel.<WH3478> They are delivered<WH4048> over to the sword<WH2719> with My people,<WH5971> therefore<WH3651> strike<WH5606> [your] thigh.<WH3409>
"For [there is] a testing;<WH976> and what<WH4100> if<WH518> even<WH1571> the rod<WH7626> which despises<WH3988> will be no<WH3808> more?" declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>

"You therefore, son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy,<WH5012> and clap<WH5221> [your] hands<WH3709> together<WH413>;<WH3709> and let the sword<WH2719> be doubled<WH3717> the third<WH7992> time,<WH7992> the sword<WH2719> for the slain.<WH2491> It is the sword<WH2719> for the great<WH1419> one<WH1419> slain,<WH2491> which surrounds<WH2314> them,

that [their] hearts<WH3820> may melt,<WH4127> and many<WH7235> fall<WH4383> at all<WH3605> their gates.<WH8179> I have given<WH5414> the glittering<WH19> sword.<WH2719> Ah! It is made<WH6213> [for striking] like lightning,<WH1300> it is wrapped<WH5844> up [in readiness] for slaughter.<WH2874>
"Show<WH2300> yourself sharp,<WH2300> go<WH3231> to the right;<WH3231> set<WH7760> yourself; go<WH8041> to the left,<WH8041> wherever<WH575> your edge<WH6440> is appointed.<WH3259>
"I shall also<WH1571> clap<WH5221> My hands<WH3709> together,<WH413> <WH3709> and I shall appease<WH5117> My wrath;<WH2534> I, the Lord,<WH3068> have spoken.<WH1696>"
And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"As for you, son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> make<WH7760> two<WH8147> ways<WH1870> for the sword<WH2719> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> to come;<WH935> both<WH8147> of them will go<WH3318> out of one<WH259> land.<WH776> And make<WH1254> a signpost;<WH3027> make<WH1254> it at the head<WH7218> of the way<WH1870> to the city.<WH5892>
"You shall mark<WH7760> a way<WH1870> for the sword<WH2719> to come<WH935> to Rabbah<WH7237> of the sons<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and to Judah<WH3063> into fortified<WH1219> Jerusalem.<WH3389>

"For the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> stands<WH5975> at the parting<WH517> of the way,<WH1870> at the head<WH7218> of the two<WH8147> ways,<WH1870> to use<WH7080> divination;<WH7081> he shakes<WH7043> the arrows,<WH2671> he consults<WH7592> the household<WH8655> idols,<WH8655> he looks<WH7200> at the liver.<WH3516>

"Into his right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> came<WH1961> the divination,<WH7081> 'Jerusalem,<WH3389>' to set<WH7760> battering<WH3733> rams,<WH3733> to open<WH6605> the mouth<WH6310> for slaughter,<WH7524> to lift<WH7311> up the voice<WH6963> with a battle<WH8643> cry,<WH8643> to set<WH7760> battering<WH3733> rams<WH3733> against<WH5921> the gates,<WH8179> to cast<WH8210> up mounds,<WH5550> to build<WH1129> a siege<WH1785> wall.<WH1785>

"And it will be to them like a false<WH7723> divination<WH7080> in their eyes;<WH5869> they have [sworn] solemn<WH7650> oaths.<WH7621> But he brings<WH2142> iniquity<WH5771> to remembrance,<WH2142> that they may be seized.<WH8610>

"Therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'Because<WH3282> you have made your iniquity<WH5771> to be remembered,<WH2142> in that your transgressions<WH6588> are uncovered,<WH1540> so that in all<WH3605> your deeds<WH5949> your sins<WH9128> appear<WH7200> – because<WH3282> you have come<WH2142> to remembrance,<WH2142> you will be seized<WH8610> with the hand.<WH3709>

'And you, O slain,<WH2491> wicked<WH7563> one,<WH7563> the prince<WH5387> of Israel,<WH3478> whose<WH834> day<WH3117> has come,<WH935> in the time<WH6256> of the punishment<WH5771> of the end,<WH7093>'

thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'Remove<WH5493> the turban,<WH4701> and take<WH7311> off<WH7311> the crown;<WH5850> this<WH2088> will [be] no<WH3808> more the same.<WH2088> Exalt<WH1361> that which<WH8217> is low,<WH8217> and abase<WH8213> that which<WH1364> is high.<WH1364>

'A ruin,<WH5754> a ruin,<WH5754> a ruin,<WH5754> I shall make<WH7760> it. This<WH2088> also<WH1571> will be no<WH3808> more, until<WH5704> He comes<WH935> whose<WH834> right<WH4941> it is; and I shall give<WH5414> it [to Him.]'

"And you, son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy<WH5012> and say,<WH559> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3068> concerning<WH413> the sons<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> and concerning<WH413> their reproach,<WH2781>' and say:<WH559> 'A sword,<WH2719> a sword<WH2719> is drawn,<WH6605> polished<WH4803> for the slaughter,<WH2874> to cause it to consume,<WH398> that it may be like lightning<WH1300> –

while they see<WH2372> for you false<WH7723> visions,<WH7723> while they divine<WH7080> lies<WH3577> for you – to place<WH5414> you on the necks<WH6677> of the wicked<WH7563> who<WH2491> are slain,<WH2491> whose<WH834> day<WH3117> has come,<WH935> in the time<WH6256> of the punishment<WH5771> of the end.<WH7093>
'Return<WH7725> [it] to its sheath.<WH8593> In the place<WH4725> where<WH834> you were created,<WH1254> in the land<WH776> of your origin,<WH4351> I shall judge<WH8199> you.

'And I shall pour<WH8210> out My indignation<WH2195> on you; I shall blow<WH6315> on you with the fire<WH784> of My wrath,<WH5678> and I shall give<WH5414> you into the hand<WH3027> of brutal<WH9059> men,<WH376> skilled<WH2796> in destruction.<WH4889>
'You will be fuel<WH402> for the fire;<WH784> your blood<WH1818> will be in the midst<WH8432> of the land.<WH776> You will not be remembered,<WH2142> for I, the Lord,<WH3068> have spoken.<WH1696>' "
